reviewText: This is a very nice collection of short films.  Animation fans should find "The Bad Plant", "Billy's Balloon", and "Nocturne" especially satisfying.  They are three of the best  animation festival shorts of the past year.

I am not speaking for my own short, Black Coffee, but the other shorts on SHORT 6 are very rewarding. I must say I am very proud to be in such great  company.
Regarding wrong RC. I received my copy last Friday and checked  it out today. Short 6 can be played on our DVD players in Europe. So I hope  Amazon changes the region code ASAP.

Wow, all I have to say is wow to this compilation of shorts. Billy's balloon is hysterical what a satire and OH MY GOD! Franky Goes to Hollywood  is the funniest thing I've seen since I don't even know JUST FLAT OUT  FUNNY. Keep it up guys I love what your doing! I can't even imagine what  your gonna do next!
